catalog_script_client.name: Validate a catalog variable phone

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_7dbded791bdccd10c024a601604bcb42
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Classic Car Parts">1cbd69791bdccd10c024a601604bcb5c</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:a4f494a11bdc8d10c024a601604bcbf8</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Validate a catalog variable phone</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
	return;
}

	var u_phone_number = '';
	var pattern = /^[(]?(\d{3})[)]?[-|\s]?(\d{3})[-|\s]?(\d{4})$/;
	var newNum = '';

	if(!pattern.test(newValue)){
		alert('Phone enter a valid phone number');
		g_form.setValue('u_phone_number', '');
	
	if(!u_phone_number.test(newNum)){

		g_form.hideAllFieldMsgs();

	newNum = '(' + u_phone_number.substring(0,3) + ') ' + u_phone_number.substring(3,6) + ' - ' + u_phone_number.substring(6,10);

		g_form.setValue('u_phone_number',newNum);


         }

}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-12-09 00:27:29</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7dbded791bdccd10c024a601604bcb42</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate a catalog variable phone</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value=" Classic Car Restoration" source="x_snc_classic_car">5662f55b1bf7f41049d9dbd8b04bcb6e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value=" Classic Car Restoration">5662f55b1bf7f41049d9dbd8b04bcb6e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_7dbded791bdccd10c024a601604bcb42</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-12-09 00:27:29</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
